prototypes.name: Portfolio Intelligence
prototypes.description: Attention-prioritized portfolio dashboard combining reporting signals with thesis alignment into a triage queue

prototypes.name: Intel Queue Cards
prototypes.description: 9 iterations on Needs Attention queue cards — scannability, signal clarity, action affordance, accessibility

prototypes.name: Email Engagement Analytics
prototypes.description: Slide-out panel showing per-email performance: hero metrics, recipient list grouped by engagement level, link performance table, 24h timeline

prototypes.name: Beta Accept Page
prototypes.description: Beta invitation acceptance page — valid invite (account creation), expired invite, invalid token states. Public-facing, centered card, no chrome.

prototypes.name: Beta Management Dashboard
prototypes.description: Internal admin tool for managing beta users through the lifecycle. Overview tab with funnel, health summary, stat cards. Users tab with filter pills, data table, engagement scores, and user detail slideout.

prototypes.name: Email Domain Blocks
prototypes.description: MetricCard, Columns, Ask/Request blocks for email composer — editor view with editable attributes and email preview with inline-styled HTML, light and dark themes

prototypes.name: Inline AI Cmd+J
prototypes.description: Four-state Cmd+J inline AI flow: selection hint, action menu (Polish/Expand/Summarize), processing, result with undo. AI-assumed design.

prototypes.name: Save as Template + AI Subject Line
prototypes.description: Two compose-level features: Save current email as reusable template (overflow menu → dialog → success) and AI subject line generation (Suggest button → 3-option popover → selection)

prototypes.name: New Domain Blocks — Milestone, Attachment, Quote
prototypes.description: Three new email composer block types: Milestone (icon + achievement), Attachment (file link), Quote (with attribution). Editor view + email preview for each, plus updated slash command menu.

prototypes.name: Beta Onboarding Wizard
prototypes.description: Interactive 4-step post-accept onboarding wizard with two-column layout, working AI chat, live sidebar preview, pill toggles, pipeline preview, and action cards. Sana AI-inspired.

prototypes.name: AI Spend Tab
prototypes.description: 5th tab for Beta Management dashboard: stat cards with sparklines, spend by feature bars, model usage table, stacked daily trend chart, top users by spend table

prototypes.name: Recipient Picker Redesign
prototypes.description: Investor Updates recipient picker with grouped contacts by type, group-level select all toggles, search, selected chips, already-sent indicators

prototypes.name: Fundraising Matching + Advisor
prototypes.description: Investor Matching card placement (in-grid, inline row, contextual) + AI Advisor button (W mark outline pill, compact pill, icon-only)

prototypes.name: Investor Contacts + Inline Edit
prototypes.description: Expanded firm row with nested team/contacts section and inline editing on all fields. Shows normal, badge-edit, text-editing, and just-saved states.

prototypes.name: Investor Match Results — Enriched Cards + Aligned Slideout
prototypes.description: Redesigned match cards with contacts, portfolio highlights, leads-rounds badge. Slideout aligned to AI-assumed chat pattern (no avatars, neutral dots, proper pills).

prototypes.name: Activity Feed Redesign
prototypes.description: Three approaches to improving the fundraising activity feed: Enhanced Timeline (richer rows with icon containers), Signal Cards (Deel-inspired notification cards), Investor-grouped (ClickUp-inspired entity clustering).

prototypes.name: Empty States Audit
prototypes.description: Comprehensive audit of all 22 empty states across 9 fundraising nav items + sub-pages. Documents current vs spec, annotates violations and drifts, identifies batch fixes.

prototypes.name: Data Room Upload with AI Rename
prototypes.description: Complete 5-phase data room upload flow with AI-suggested file renaming: source, select, processing, suggestions with inline rename + folder picker, success with rename provenance

prototypes.name: Match Analysis Card
prototypes.description: Investor profile Overview tab with new Match Analysis sidebar card. Shows match score badge, reason pills, expandable AI conversation with follow-up Q&A, attribution line.

prototypes.name: Investor Table — Column Management + Custom Groups
prototypes.description: Two features for the Investors table: Manage Columns modal (matching Contacts pattern) with hidden/visible panels and drag-to-reorder, plus custom investor groups as colored tabs alongside lifecycle segments with inline create/rename/delete.

prototypes.name: Fundraising Matching Steps
prototypes.description: 5-phase static snapshots for investor matching animation: Start, Click, Processing, Results, Complete

prototypes.name: NDA + Data Room Status Card
prototypes.description: Compact NDA status and data room access card for investor profile Relationship tab. 3 states: signed+shares, sent awaiting, not started. Flat metadata grid with contextual quick actions.
